HKQuery  predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier:) Type MethodpredicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+class func predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier: HKHealthConceptIdentifier) -> NSPredicate Parameters medicationConceptIdentifierThe identifier of the medication that a dose event was created for.

Creates a predicate for use with HKQuery subclasses.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKMedicationDoseEvent samples that match a medication’s concept identifier.

Type Method# predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
class func predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier: HKHealthConceptIdentifier) -> NSPredicate
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier:)#parameters)

`medicationConceptIdentifier`The identifier of the medication that a dose event was created for.

## [Discussion](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForMedicationDoseEvent(medicationConceptIdentifier:)#discussion)

Creates a predicate for use with HKQuery subclasses.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKMedicationDoseEvent samples that match a medication’s concept identifier.
